mapper.select: /* * 1.采购报价页面-我的报价Tab */ SELECT T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate, /*采购报价时间*/ T_ICIN1.U_BaseEntry, /*询价单编号*/ T_ICIN1.U_CardName, /*供应商名称*/ T_ICIN1.U_CardCode, /*供应商代码*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoGroupCode, /*供应商性质*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoModle, /*报价型号*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoBrand, /*报价品牌*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoLevel, /*供应商等级*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoCurr, /*报价货币*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoQty, /*报价数量*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoYear, /*报价批次*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoPrice, /*供方报价*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoDelivery, /*供方交期*/ T_ICIN1.U_QuoRemark, /*供方备注*/ T_ICIN1.U_Status, /*报价状态*/ ( T_ICIN1.U_QuoCurr + '+' + T_ICIN1.U_QuoVatGroup + '+' + CAST ( CAST ( T_OVTG.Rate AS FLOAT ) AS VARCHAR ) ) AS 'CurVat', ( T_ICIN1.U_QuoCurr + N'（' + CAST ( CAST ( T_OVTG.Rate AS FLOAT ) AS VARCHAR ) ) + N'%）' AS 'CurVatLabel', T_OUSI.UserName AS 'U_BuyerName',/*采购员姓名*/ T_OCDP.Name AS 'DftDeptName' /*采购部门名称*/ FROM T_ICIN1 LEFT JOIN T_OUSI ON T_ICIN1.U_Buyer = T_OUSI.UserSign /*采购员信息*/ LEFT JOIN T_OCDP ON T_OUSI.DftDept = T_OCDP.DeptCode /*公司部门*/ LEFT JOIN T_OVTG ON T_OVTG.Code = T_ICIN1.U_QuoVatGroup /*税率*/ /*查询关联型号*/ WHERE T_ICIN1.U_QuoModle IN ( SELECT SDADA_1.sno FROM SDADA SDADA_1 WHERE SDADA_1.TAG IN ( SELECT SDADA.TAG FROM SDADA WHERE SDADA.sno = #{sc.modle} ) ) AND T_ICIN1.U_Buyer = #{sc.userSign} /*查询采购员*/ AND T_ICIN1.U_QuoDate IS NOT NULL
